scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = { version: 3, pages404: true, caseSensitive: false, basePath: '', redirects: [], headers: [], dynamicRoutes: [], staticRoutes: [{ page: '/', regex: '^/(?:/)?$', routeKeys: {}, namedRegex: '^/(?:/)?$' }], dataRoutes: [], rewrites: [] }; fs.writeFileSync('out/routes-manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest));"
